word: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE TYPICAL OF THOSE BEING ASKED TODAY. HOW CAN WE EXPLAIN THE POWER ATTENDING POPULAR REVIVAL MOVEMENTS IN WHICH NO ATTEMPT IS MADE TO HONOR GOD'S LAW? WHAT ABOUT THE TONGUES MOVEMENT IN SOME PROTESTANT AND CATHOLIC CHURCHES? ARE HEALING MIRACLES, WHICH ACCENT SOME OF THE REVIVALS OF OUR TIME, REAL? CAN GOD WORK MIRACLES THROUGH THOSE WHO PROCLAIM JESUS' PARDON FOR SINS AND YET TEACH OTHERS TO IGNORE THE TEN COMMANDMENTS AS UNNECESSARY OR IMPOSSIBLE?
